Articles.Content:
Don't know if anyone caught this on r/kerbalspaceprogram, Someone made a Android app based on the transfer calculator, someone else combined it with the transparent screen app for a nice overlay effect during game play. Aside from making me want to get an android phone, it got my imagination going.

Think about combining mods with apps and Google glass! Now think of what other apps/mods are possible; a HUD like in steam gauges; Graphs from Telemachus; how about a resource overlay for ships; and certainly mechjeb windows.

The possibilities are almost limitless. What other uses for Glass can we think of?

http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/1po54a/no_protractor_use_a_ksp_app_a_transparent_screen/
So far I've found KSP Informer, KSP Orbit and KSP Orbicalc for Android. Great applications, highly recommended.
